_dropbox.title: Dropbox
_dropbox.s12: Unable to connect to Dropbox. Please restart your system and try again. If problem remains, try re-install the Dropbox app.
_dropbox.s13: Unable to sync files to Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system.
_dropbox.s14: Unable to download files from Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system. %s
_dropbox.s15: Unable to upload files to Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system. %s
_dropbox.s16: Unable to download files from Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system. %s
_dropbox.s17: Unable to upload files to Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system. %s
_dropbox.s18: Unable to sync files to Dropbox. Please check your system and Dropbox settings or restart your system.
_dropbox.s19: Dropbox is out of space. Failed to upload %s
_dropbox.s20: Your system is out of space. Failed to download %s
_dropbox.s21: Sync stopped until the next sync interval time
_dropbox.msg1: This will stop syncing your files with Dropbox, but won't delete the files in the Dropbox folder on this device.
